text: When I feel something blocking connection, I notice it and choose to stay open and present instead.
During moments of closeness, I notice any resistance and choose to breathe and stay grounded instead of withdrawing.
When I notice myself pulling away from intimacy, I recognize the pattern and choose to stay connected instead.
I let intimacy blocks prevent me from feeling deeply connected to others in relationships.
When I feel the urge to protect myself from vulnerability, I notice it and choose to open up gradually instead.
I see when fear is creating distance, and I choose to address the fear directly instead of letting it block connection.
When I notice barriers rising during emotional moments, I recognize them and choose to stay present instead.
I let intimacy blocks control my ability to experience deep emotional connections with others.
When I feel the pull to shut down or withdraw, I notice it and choose to communicate my needs instead.
I recognize when old patterns are blocking intimacy, and I choose to respond from the present moment instead.
When I notice difficulty feeling connected, I pause and identify what's blocking me instead of avoiding it.
I let barriers or blocks prevent me from identifying and addressing what stops me from feeling deeply connected.
When I feel walls going up, I notice them and choose to lower them gradually with awareness.
I see when my defenses are preventing intimacy, and I choose to soften them and stay open instead.
When I notice myself overthinking or controlling intimacy, I recognize it and choose to let go and be present instead.
I let intimacy blocks create significant barriers that prevent me from experiencing deep emotional connections.
When I feel the urge to protect myself from closeness, I notice it and choose to trust and open up instead.
I recognize when something is stopping me from connecting deeply, and I choose to address it directly.
When I notice blocks forming, I interrupt them early by staying grounded and choosing connection instead.
I let intimacy barriers prevent me from feeling deeply connected without significant blocks or obstacles.
